JobFullDesc: We are looking for an experienced global benefits professional with subject matter expertise in Merger and Acquisition and/or Procurement processes to help support the successful delivery of benefits programs. This role will partner closely with Program Managers within the Global Benefits team to support US Benefits M&A activity including pre- and post-close actions, and lead key initiatives that support integrating benefits into newly acquired companies.  This role will also lead supplier sourcing and management activities for US Benefits, including documenting supplier management responsibilities, supporting supplier evaluations, request for proposals, selection, contracting, security/privacy and accessibility reviews, and onboarding.
